metadata.title: CVE-2020-6504 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient policy enforcement in notifications in Google Chrome prior to74.0.3729.108 allowed a remote attacker to bypass notification restrictionsvia a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
